short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Report job postings that seem fraudulent.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Job hunting can be stressful, and fake or suspicious listings make it even harder. The Job Posting Report extension is here to help! This tool allows you to see how many people have flagged a job posting on Indeed or LinkedIn as suspicious or fake. With just a glance, the notification badge shows the number of reports for any listing you're viewing.

Features:

View Reports - See how many users have flagged a job and read comments on why it was reported.
Community Feedback - Check reports and comments from other job seekers to help you make informed decisions.
Report Suspicious Jobs - Quickly mark any listing that seems suspicious or fake and help the community stay safe.

Why Install?

Save Time: Avoid wasting time on fake job postings.
Stay Informed: Benefit from the experiences of other job seekers.
Contribute: Protect others by reporting shady listings.
